Metadata: IMPROVING THE QUALITY OF COMMERCIALLY PROCESSED DUNGENESS CRAB

The quality of Dungeness crab, like that of almost any food, depends on a number of factors, including raw product quality, processing, packaging, and storage conditions, This fact sheet outlines some of these important factors that contribute to increasing overall quality; more specifically, it discusses blue discoloration, salt content, and shelf life. KW: SEAFOOD PROCESSING.
